name: A Part of Me Who Died on Sunday
name_original: A Part of Me Who Died on Sunday
description:
WANNA KEEP UP WITH THE GAME AND JUST GENERALLY BORED? JOIN THE  DISCORD!

WANT ACCESS TO SENSEI OVERNIGHT TWO WEEKS BEFORE PUBLIC RELEASE? YOU DO?! HEAD OVER TO MY PATREON OR SUBSCRIBESTAR!

A Part of Me Who Died on Sunday is an episodic prequel to the events of Sensei Overnight. Follow the story of Noko Otana, an orphan and twin brother to Niyama Otana. Siblings who now come from different environments, they always find the time to meet up  at a park, right in between their respective schools and homes. However, as they both prepare to return to middle school after winter break, an unexpected letter arrives for one of them that is destined to challenge their relationship.

A Part of Me Who Died on Sunday is a side project of mine that I've had a lot of fun creating. I'm setting it up to be a medium-lengthed Visual Novel, with returning characters and new storylines to explore.

Note that this game does not contain any sexual content. Not now or in the future.

If you'd like to check out my other game (which does contain sexual content), you can do so here!
